short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: word filter that replaces various strings based on xkcd 1288(http://xkcd.com/1288). and 'duck' with 'afuzzyduck'

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: word filter that replaces various strings based on the substitution list in xkcd comic 1288. and 'duck' with 'afuzzyduck'. Inspired by a one-off comment on IRC I paid far too much attention to
